overview: A portfolio website built with Django to showcase projects, services, and provide contact functionality.

features.name: Home Page
features.description: The main landing page that introduces the website and provides navigation to other sections.

features.name: About Page
features.description: Provides information about the website owner, including skills, experience, and background.

features.name: Projects Section
features.description: Showcases completed projects with details, images, and descriptions.

features.name: Services Section
features.description: Lists the services offered with descriptions and categorization.

features.name: Contact Form
features.description: Allows visitors to send messages directly through the website.

api_endpoints.description: Show details of a specific project
